```{r linear-regression, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Load dataset
data(iris)

# Fit a linear regression model: Sepal.Width ~ Sepal.Length
lm_model <- lm(Sepal.Width ~ Sepal.Length, data = iris)

# Model summary
summary(lm_model)

# Predictions for new Sepal.Length values within the range of iris data
new_data <- data.frame(Sepal.Length = c(5, 6, 7))
predictions <- predict(lm_model, new_data, interval = "confidence")
predictions

# Plot data with regression line
plot(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width, 
     pch = 19, col = "blue", 
     xlab = "Sepal Length", ylab = "Sepal Width",
     main = "Linear Regression: Sepal Width ~ Sepal Length") 
abline(lm_model, col = "red", lwd = 2)

```
